text: is a Japanese sportsman. He is best known as a gymnast.SportsReference.com (SR/Olympics), Kazuhito Tanaka ; retrieved 2012-8-3. ==Career== Tanaka was part of a team which won the team silver medal in gymnastics at the 2012 Summer Olympics.Eccles, Louise. "Robbed! Heartbreak for GB gymnasts as they are handed historic silver medal then bumped down to bronze after Japanese appeal," Daily Mail (UK). 30 July 2012; retrieved 2012-8-3. ==Related pages== * Sports in Japan * Japan at the Olympics * Ryohei Kato * Yusuke Tanaka * K≈çhei Uchimura * Koji Yamamuro ==References== ==Other websites== * Kazuhito Tanaka at London2012.com Category:Living people Category:1985 births Category:Olympic silver medalists for Japan Category:Japanese gymnasts Category:People from Wakayama Prefecture
title: Kazuhito Tanaka
